data.text: @TwistedMacSista I feel you! I want to see Brit live (I never have) and I would DIE to see my loves from my teenage years, Backstreet Boys in concert again. Thanks for sharing your fun experiences! 💕

@janedoze31 Awwww....I'm not going to as many shows then I have in the past. Haha I just didn't want to miss out on something special when it comes to my teenage nostalgia....I hope what I produce from my shows help fill that void. You deserve all this fun as well. I hope it happens for you
@TwistedMacSista @Vegas @britneyspears @dashabbfan I’m so jealous! I swear I am living vicariously through you and all the fun concerts you attend!
